mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tyler, Robert, 1816-1877
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Claims that the South must pull together with the rest of the country; feels that the Fremont Party will try to dominate the South; suggests taht it is Wise's responsibility to strenthen the South and join it with the North; Tyler claims that Wise's "actions will make civil war." Autograph Letter Signed. Printed in Auchampaugh.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1856 September 12, Robert Tyler, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania to Henry A. Wise
